## BaseQuestionComponent class

A base component class for implementing a question component. Responsible for declaring the neccesary inputs &amp; exposing state bindings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class BaseQuestionComponent<TBindings extends object | null, TQuestion extends Question<TBindings, object | null>> implements QuestionComponent<TBindings, object | null> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [QuestionComponent](./dynamic-forms.questioncomponent.md)<!-- -->&lt;TBindings, object \| null&gt;
